scripts.dev: npm run docs && concurrently -n web,desk -c yellow,green "vite --config ./webapp/vite.config.webapp.ts --clearScreen false -l info" "vite --config ./desktop/vite.config.desktop.ts build --mode development -l info -w --clearScreen false"
scripts.build: node ./scripts/createDocs.js && tsc && vite build --config ./webapp/vite.config.webapp.ts && vite build --config ./desktop/vite.config.desktop.ts
scripts.dist: npm run dist:webapp && npm run dist:desktop
